titles.title: Electing members of the Joint Committee on Printing and the Joint Committee of Congress on the Library.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.
Mr. Ney asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 03/06/1997--Introduced. Elects Representatives Robert Ney, Kay Granger, Steny H. Hoyer, and Sam Gejdenson to the Joint Committee on Printing. Elects Representatives Robert Ney, Vernon J. Ehlers, Carolyn C. Kilpatrick, and Sam Gejdenson to the Joint Committee on the Library.
